'''Umbertail Falcon''' is a type of [[Falcons|falcon]] which can be found as a [[Wildlife]].

Falcons are usually found in places with high altitude and are continuously flying in a round path.

==Drops==
{{Card|Fowl|2}}

Killing one for the first time will add this creature's entry into your in-game [[archive]].

==Locations==
Can be found flying around a mountain top at [[Huaguang Stone Forest]], and flying around the island south of [[Amakumo Peak]].
